title: Best of Comedy Gold Minds: Cedric the Entertainer
description:
This week on the Best of Comedy Gold Minds we're featuring Kevin's conversation with actor and comedic legend Cedric the Entertainer, They talk about the groundbreaking Kings of Comedy tour, performing on Def Comedy Jam and ComicView, and working with other comedic greats like D.L. Hughley, Steve Harvey, and Bernie Mac.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (kevin hart, cedric the entertainer)
